article.headline: Coastal Carolina 69, Georgia Southern 58
article.story: STATESBORO, Ga. -- Chad Gray scored 24 points to lead Coastal Carolina to a 69-58 victory over Georgia Southern on Tuesday night and extend the Chanticleers' winning streak to five games. Gray was 10-for-12 from the field to help Coastal Carolina pull away in the second half by shooting 64 percent from the floor (16-for-25). The Chanticleers (9-2), who are off to their best start since the 1981-82 season, shot 59.6 percent for the game (28-for-47). Joseph Harris scored 13 points and had 10 rebounds for Coastal Carolina. Mario Edwards scored 12 points and Logan Johnson added 11 for the Chanticleers. Willie Powers led Georgia Southern (3-8), which has lost four consecutive games, with 19 points. Colby Wohlleb added 11 points for the Eagles, who shot 52.2 percent from the field (12-for-23) in the first half, but dropped to 33.3 percent in the second half (9-for-27).

statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).

statistics.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.
